md3.util
Class QuaternionMath

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--md3.util.QuaternionMath
public final class QuaternionMath
extends java.lang.Object

Booch utility class with quaternion math operations. The quaternions handled by this class are represented as float[] quat with quat.length==4. The structure of the arrays is as follows: quat[0]==X, quat[1]==Y, quat[2]==Z and quat[3]==S, so the scalar part comes last!

Author:
Erwin Vervaet (klr8@fragland.net)

quaternionSlerp

public static final float[] quaternionSlerp(float[] from,
                                            float[] to,
                                            float frac)

Do slerp (spherical linear interpolation) interpolation of quaternions along unit 4d sphere.

Parameters:
from - Start rotation.
to - End rotation.
frac - Specifies the slerp interpolation fraction.
Returns:
Quaternion describing rotation interpolated between from and to quaternions.
